title: Python Programming Fundamentals
description: This course is designed for complete beginners with no prior programming experience. It will equip you with the basic building blocks of Python programming, enabling you to write simple scripts and programs.

learning_outcomes.title: Python Basics
learning_outcomes.content: Setting up your development environment, variables, data types (numbers, strings, booleans, lists, etc.), operators, and working with user input.

learning_outcomes.title: Control Flow
learning_outcomes.content: Using conditional statements (if/else) and loops (for/while) to control the flow of your programs.

learning_outcomes.title: Functions
learning_outcomes.content: Defining and using functions to create reusable blocks of code.

learning_outcomes.title: Modules and Packages
learning_outcomes.content: Importing and utilizing pre-written code to enhance your programs.
